{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":2967450,"name":"tkchan","username":"tkchan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/ee59a6/{size}.png","created_at":"2021-09-07T01:49:29.370Z","cooked":"

My Fusion360 is showing my account has expired but yet when I log in to my Autodesk Account (Education), I’m not seeing any expiration notice or any ‘reactivation’ link or anything. Anyone has gone through this recently and know/remember how they were able to reactivate their account? [I’m a mentor but do not have a .edu email account].

We have been using Fusion 360 for several year now and we’re all fairly comfortable with it. So it would suck if the administration side of things will be what caused us to move away from Fusion 360.

Thanks.

Im having the same issue. It keeps asking me for ID. I don’t have an official school ID because I’m not an employee, but I do have an RFID fob because I’m a contractor.

Getting an official letterhead document can work, but in the past has taken several weeks

Maybe we can get some sort of code in the Passwords & Vouchers this year. This is the 2nd or 3rd time I’ve had to do this.

Onshape does not require such process, which is making it look more and more attractive

All I did was click F360 in the “education” perks page that has the “get access” button while logged in and it re-enabled it for me, no ID needed.

I’ve had issues with this before as well. Not sure what we are doing differently but different mentors/students have different levels of difficulty signing up and getting everything installed. Right now it won’t let me download Inventor 2022, keeps taking me to an error 404 type page.

Any resolution here? Mentor trying to get inventor and other autodesk stuff going this year and since I can’t qualify for a SheerID for an educator I’m out of luck currently.

Heading over to the FIRST site and see what if any information is there.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":32,"updated_at":"2021-09-20T05:40:38.078Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":211,"readers_count":210,"score":67.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":395876,"topic_slug":"autodesks-fusion-360-mentor-admin-account-expiration-how-to-reactivate-account","display_username":"Matt Klarich","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":34685,"hidden":false,"trust_level":1,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/autodesks-fusion-360-mentor-admin-account-expiration-how-to-reactivate-account/395876/7","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2968713,"name":"Nathan Shepherd","username":"NShep98","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/nshep98/{size}/224800_2.png","created_at":"2021-09-20T20:34:08.336Z","cooked":"

The best way I can understand the situation is that when Autodesk started cracking down asking for more verification in recent years, everyone with an existing account basically flips a coin as to whether it caused them trouble or not.

I know when I graduated University this past year I had to make an entirely new account with a different email address because it kept trying to make me verify I was still a student and I could never get to the part where I say I am a “Design Competition Mentor”. While that’s not really ideal, it did yield positive results.

I will ping @inventor_phild in case he has any input, but overall the Educational portion of the site seems particularly dysfunctional.

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":32,"updated_at":"2021-09-20T20:34:08.336Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":3,"reads":182,"readers_count":181,"score":51.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":395876,"topic_slug":"autodesks-fusion-360-mentor-admin-account-expiration-how-to-reactivate-account","display_username":"Nathan Shepherd","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":25762,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2079 A -> 246 M -> 1153/1119 M"},"post_url":"/t/autodesks-fusion-360-mentor-admin-account-expiration-how-to-reactivate-account/395876/8","custom_user_title":"2079 A -> 246 M -> 1153/1119 M","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2992961,"name":"Anand Rajamani","username":"asid61","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/asid61/{size}/7179_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-16T22:31:34.878Z","cooked":"

Bumping this. Running into the same issue now that it has been 1.5 years since I graduated college and I don’t have an edu email/job. Contacted support, made an Autodesk forum post, even made an entirely new account - no dice. Fusion 360 is basically useless for FRC if mentors can’t get licenses. I’m curious if Inventor has the same issues, given that Autodesk owns both.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":32,"updated_at":"2022-01-16T22:32:32.462Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":12,"reads":144,"readers_count":143,"score":93.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":395876,"topic_slug":"autodesks-fusion-360-mentor-admin-account-expiration-how-to-reactivate-account","display_username":"Anand Rajamani","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":21715,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/autodesks-fusion-360-mentor-admin-account-expiration-how-to-reactivate-account/395876/9","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2993241,"name":"tkchan","username":"tkchan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/t/ee59a6/{size}.png","created_at":"2022-01-17T15:16:28.823Z","cooked":"

Try this:

Go to Competitions: FIRST | Autodesk Education Community. Go all the way to the bottom [Software] Get Fusion 360. Click on that and then follow through (and select you already have an account).

It should re-up you for another year. But the entire timing is weird with Autodesk. I’m able to renewal mine (finally), I have 1 mentor who tries to create a new account but still couldn’t, I have 4-5 new students able to signup for new account but I also have a student who couldn’t renew his.

Honestly, I really think Autodesk, being as large of a corporation as they are, should be able to make the entire account system far less complicated for FIRST. You would think that they can setup a ‘promocode’ that is only available through the Lead Mentor’s dashboard and that goes to a special renew/create page and make it that simple but no, this annual pain in the rear process is just so badly implemented. If anyone who works for Autodesk directly or indirectly ought to let them know that this crazy system is just leaving a lot of bad feelings with a lot of current/future engineers who WILL have a say on what product their employer SHOULD be using.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":32,"updated_at":"2022-01-17T15:16:28.823Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":9,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":139,"readers_count":138,"score":57.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":395876,"topic_slug":"autodesks-fusion-360-mentor-admin-account-expiration-how-to-reactivate-account","display_username":"tkchan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://www.autodesk.com/education/competitions/first","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Competitions: FIRST | Autodesk Education Community","clicks":34}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":21715,"username":"asid61","name":"Anand Rajamani","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/asid61/{size}/7179_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":26389,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"think outside of the box from time to time"},"post_url":"/t/autodesks-fusion-360-mentor-admin-account-expiration-how-to-reactivate-account/395876/10","custom_user_title":"think outside of the box from time to time","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":2993258,"name":"tstew","username":"tstew","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/tstew/{size}/7495_2.png","created_at":"2022-01-17T15:37:24.911Z","cooked":"

I am a mentor who does not work for an educational institution. I was struggling to get access and I eventually figured out how to get access. The problem was that the account I was using was previously registered for education access as a student from when I was a student in the past.

I had to create new Autodesk account and go through the education access sign up process from scratch. I was able select “Design Competition Mentor” from the dropdown and get access.

image773×930 42.1 KB

A real shame.

Yup. I’m done with F360 as well. My account expired and I can’t renew it without paying $700/year or create a new account. Either way, I’ve lost access to my designs unless I pay them. They’re dead to me. Strange thing to do to mentors who have influence on which CAD program is learned by kids who will grow up to make corporate decisions.

This message disappeared and I was finally able to get into Fusion! Unfortunately all of 1072’s CAM is still locked in the original account, and I can’t transfer ownership of the project unless I subscribe. I will probably purchase a 1-month trial simply to move the files over from the old account to the new one, as well as transfer ownership to a 1072 email.

Look into using their Team function, it’ll allow you to create a repository with multiple Administrators so that they can all add new ppl to the repo as well as managed the files.

Export/extract all your old files and then manually uploaded into the new Team function (or if you add your old acct to the repo, he can directly copy those files/folders into the team). I would say right now the only reason for us to keep using Fusion (that and the familiarity with their CAM).

I can’t appoint any admins with a free account. But it’s good to know it’s possible next time.

You should be able to. I’m on a free mentor account as well. our old way was shared off from one of my mentor who’s a paid subscriber himself so once he was added as an admin to the Team, he’s able to just grab the entire shared folder and copy up into the Team section (I created a separate folder for this).
